title: Don’t hold your breath
author: VD
content_html:
ZT may be waiting a long, long time:

I already bought Wrath of Angels from amazon but would rather buy from you if you had it direct some place. Might actually get it faster as well as it seems to be on back order at Amazon.

You’d better cancel that order, ZT, since Pocket won’t be providing Amazon with Wrath anytime soon. Or ever, as far as I know, since I reclaimed the rights from them after they sat on it longer than the contract allowed. If you’d like to read it in material form, I strongly suggest buying it here since that’s the only place you can do so. As for those of you who are waiting on the second run, the books have shipped from the printers so they should be going out relatively soon.
